title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma & other LLMs packaged as runnable Docker-like CLI tools.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API; works in Node and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served locally.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for any Ollama model; runs entirely in browser.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI (TUI) wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, model switching and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama; includes CLI helper.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package wrapping the Ollama HTTP API for Node and browser environments.

title: ollama-python PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package providing Python bindings for local Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting pipelines use Ollama models for query answering and generation.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and CLI for Ollama with model management and chat completions.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for GitHub Copilot using Ollama-hosted code models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama Discord bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate for Ollama with async Tokio support; published on crates.io.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with Open-WebUI, Postgres, and GPU runtime flags.

title: ollama-react-hooks
summary: Minimal React hooks library for streaming chat completions from Ollama into front-end apps.

title: Ollama models library
summary: Official registry of Modelfile definitions for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama and more.
